      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Zombie.accountForLostArm(GameMap map)
      When a zombie loses an arm, he has a slight chance to drop weapons he is holding When a zombie loses both of his arms, he can no longer carry weapons and must drop them all
      void Zombie.accountForLostLeg(GameMap map)
      When a zombie loses one leg, he is only able to walk at half of his original speed When a zombie loses both legs, he is now unable to move at all
